TITLE.LOCALISED_TEXT: 無限に廻るもの、ウラモグ

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent.
Quando lanci Ulamog, il Cerchio Infinito distruggi un permanente bersaglio.
Wenn du Ulamog, den unendlichen Wirbel, wirkst, zerstöre eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl.
Quand vous lancez Ulamog, l'Épicycle Infini, détruisez un permanent ciblé.
Cuando lances a Ulamog, la espiral infinita, destruye el permanente objetivo.
あなたが無限に廻るもの、ウラモグを唱えたとき、パーマネント１つを対象とし、それを破壊する。
When you cast Ulamog, the Infinite Gyre, destroy target permanent.
Когда вы разыгрываете Уламога, Бесконечный Вихрь, уничтожьте целевой перманент.
Quando conjurar Ulamog, o Vórtice Infinito, destrua a permanente alvo.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.TARGET_DEFINITION: local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_PLANESWALKER ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY_ONLY, EffectController() )
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local target = EffectDC():Get_Targets(0):Get_NthCardPtr(0) if target ~= nil then target:Destroy() end

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
Annientatore 4 (Ogniqualvolta questa creatura attacca, il giocatore in difesa sacrifica quattro permanenti.)
Vernichter 4 (Immer wenn diese Kreatur angreift, opfert der verteidigende Spieler vier bleibende Karten.)
Annihilateur 4 (À chaque fois que cette créature attaque, le joueur défenseur sacrifie quatre permanents.)
Aniquilador 4. (Siempre que esta criatura ataque, el jugador defensor sacrifica cuatro permanentes.)
滅殺 ４ （このクリーチャーが攻撃するたび、防御プレイヤーはパーマネントを４つ生け贄に捧げる。）
Annihilator 4 (Whenever this creature attacks, defending player sacrifices four permanents.)
Аннигилятор 4 (Каждый раз когда это существо атакует, защищающийся игрок приносит в жертву четыре перманента.)
Aniquilador 4 (Toda vez que esta criatura ataca, o jogador defensor sacrifica quatro permanentes.)
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION:
local defendingPlayer = Object():GetPlayerAttacked() local filter = Object():GetFilter() filter:Clear() filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ARTIFACT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_LAND ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_CREATURE ) filter:AddCardType( CARD_TYPE_PLANESWALKER ) filter:NotTargetted() filter:SetController( defendingPlayer ) filter:SetZone( ZONE_IN_PLAY ) filter:SetHint( HINT_ENEMY, defendingPlayer ) local numberOfTargets = filter:CountStopAt( 4 ) if numberOfTargets > 0 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetCount( numberOfTargets ) defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 0, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_ONE_OF_FOUR" )
if numberOfTargets > 1 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 1, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_TWO_OF_FOUR" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 2 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 2, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_THREE_OF_FOUR" ) end
if numberOfTargets > 3 then defendingPlayer:SetTargetPrompt( 3, "CARD_QUERY_ANNIHILATOR_CHOOSE_PERMANENT_FOUR_OF_FOUR" ) end
defendingPlayer:ChooseTargets( NO_VALIDATION, EffectDC():Make_Targets(1) ) end

local target_array = {} for i=0,3 do target_array[i] = EffectDC():Get_Targets(1):Get_NthCardPtr(i) end for i=0,3 do if target_array[i] ~= nil then local player = target_array[i]:GetPlayer() target_array[i]:Sacrifice(player) end end

STATIC_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: 無限に廻るもの、ウラモグは破壊されない。

TRIGGERED_ABILITY.LOCALISED_TEXT: When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Quando Ulamog viene messo in un cimitero da qualsiasi zona, il suo proprietario rimescola il suo cimitero nel suo grimorio.
Wenn Ulamog von irgendwoher auf den Friedhof gelegt wird, mischt sein Besitzer seinen Friedhof in seine Bibliothek.
Quand Ulamog est mis dans un cimetière depuis n'importe où, son propriétaire mélange son cimetière à sa bibliothèque.
Cuando Ulamog vaya a un cementerio desde cualquier parte, su propietario baraja su cementerio en su biblioteca.
無限に廻るもの、ウラモグがいずれかの領域からいずれかの墓地に置かれたとき、そのオーナーは自分の墓地を自分のライブラリーに加えて切り直す。
When Ulamog is put into a graveyard from anywhere, its owner shuffles his or her graveyard into his or her library.
Когда Уламог попадает откуда-либо на кладбище, его владелец втасовывает свое кладбище в свою библиотеку.
Quando Ulamog é colocado num cemitério vindo de qualquer lugar, seu dono embaralha seu próprio cemitério em seu próprio grimório.
TRIGGERED_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local owner = Object():GetOwner() if (owner ~= nil) then owner:MoveLocalZone( ZONE_GRAVEYARD, ZONE_LIBRARY ) owner:ShuffleLibrary() end
